name: Temporary Intern
description:
The first entry on a series of two-week projects, in which I challenge myself in order to expand my portfolio and practice my game development skills.

Some things that would need changes are, obviously, the Main Menu UI, adding more puzzles and more mechanics to it, and also fixing the sound.

For a two-week project, I'm happy with the outcome and I realized I need to manage my time better (no pun intended).
I might come back to these projects in the future, therefore the "Release Status" being "On Hold".

Hope you have fun, feedback is highly appreciated!

Pyro

---

Temporary Intern allows you to play with an intern in the Time Control Center. Due to some bad adjustments, something goes terribly wrong. It's up to Goof, the intern, to fix these issues before Master Chronos notices!
